articles.description: Arne Slot's new-look Liverpool got their grand unveiling in the Community Shield defeat by Crystal Palace at Wembley - and the reviews are in.
articles.title: Liverpool: Arne Slot's new-look Reds launched at Wembley - with bugs to fix

articles.description: A second Japanese boxer has died from brain injuries suffered during separate bouts at the same event in Tokyo.
articles.title: Hiromasa Urakawa: Second Japanese boxer from Tokyo event dies from brain injury

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot does not believe that Crystal Palace fans intended to disrupt the minute's silence held in remembrance of Diogo Jota and Andre Silva before the Community Shield.
articles.title: Crystal Palace fans disrupting Jota silence had 'no bad intention', says Arne Slot

articles.description: Crystal Palace boss Oliver Glasner says would not swap the Community Shield win over Liverpool for a spot in the Europa League before their appeal result.
articles.title: Crystal Palace appeal: Oliver Glasner would not swap Community Shield for Europa League

articles.description: Justin Rose beats JJ Spaun in a nail-biting play-off to win the St Jude Championship for his first PGA title in more than two years.
articles.title: St Jude Championship: Justin Rose beats JJ Spaun in play-off as Tommy Fleetwood denied

articles.description: Jofra Archer takes two wickets and James Vince scores 41 as Southern Brave comfortably beat Birmingham Phoenix in the men's Hundred.
articles.title: The Hundred 2025 results: Jofra Archer takes two wickets as Southern Brave thrash Birmingham Phoenix

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at what Marcus Rashford faces at Barcelona before his potential debut in La Liga.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Former Manchester United striker set to make Barcelona debut after captain uncertainty

articles.description: As Liverpool prepare for their first competitive game since his death, BBC Sport remembers "humble" Diogo Jota.
articles.title: Diogo Jota: Remembering former Liverpool & Portugal forward

articles.description: Celtic maintained their 100% start to their Scottish Premiership title defence with a comfortable victory at Aberdeen at Pittodrie.
articles.title: Aberdeen 0-2 Celtic: Defending champions ease to victory at Pittodrie

articles.description: Nascar Xfinity points leader Connor Zilisch breaks his collarbone after falling from his car while celebrating a win.
articles.title: Connor Zilisch: Nascar driver breaks collarbone in fall celebrating win
